description:
Binary Holds are now making their hold packs out of recycled plastic, so future generations can enjoy getting a grip on our planet too.

Whether you use them as finger buckets in vertical terrain or heinous crimps in the steeps, these mini jugs are sure to test your finger strength.

  • Made from recycled ABS plastic
  • Comes with mounting hardware
name: Binary Holds Tykes Recycled 10 Mini Jug Hold Pack
